Hardware: CUDA

01 September 2017
  1. CUDA: cuda short for compute unified device architecture is a parallel computing and application programming interface model, It allows developers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit(GPU) for general purpose processing - an approach termed GPGPU(General computing on Graphics Processing Units).
